++ Favria

Female Dwarf priest leader of [Ashmadai] in [Gorda], worshiper of [Asmodeus]

Loot: [Lexicon of the Hells]

++++Staff of False Life
  used in the rituals to prevent cult members from dying when they spill thier blood on their stone "portal"
  -Must attune(by a spell caster), has 3 charges
  -Can use an action to grant a target 1d10 + the sum of all spell caster levels Temporary Hitpoints
  -Temporary Hitpoints fade after a long rest
  -Staff gains 1d4 charges each dawn
